item.title: Cloudy with a chance of databases
item.description: Michael Stonebraker is a live legend, godfather of databases, relational patriarch, Miles Davis in the database World. He stood at the database roots in 70 and to this day he stay on the bleeding edge of a data technologies. Today we will review his keynote “The cloud in your feature” from online conference Postgres Build 2021. All goes to the clouds When you try to hide your hardware, wires and pipes under the floor in central London or Franfurkt, cloud guys from Microsoft Azure box up data centers in srandard 40 foot shipping containers and drop them around the World in places with cheap power.
